establishment.name: Mark Twain K-8
establishment.owner: BOARD OF ED CITY OF DETROIT

properties.name: Mark Twain K-8
properties.owner: BOARD OF ED CITY OF DETROIT

violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription:
(A) A HANDWASHING SINK shall be maintained so that it is accessible at all times for EMPLOYEE use and used for no other purpose. (Pf)
(B)  An automatic handwashing facility shall be used in accordance with manufacturer's instructions. (Pf)
violationsByInspectionidList.correctionDescription: Handwashing sinks are to be accessible for use at all times

violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: EQUIPMENT shall be maintained in a state of repair and condition that meets the requirements of the code.
If necessary to keep rooms free of excessive heat, steam, condensation, vapors, obnoxious odors, smoke, and fumes, mechanical ventilation of sufficient capacity shall be provided.
Except as otherwise allowed, a toilet room located on the PREMISES shall be completely enclosed and provided with a tight-fitting and self-closing door.

(A) A HANDWASHING SINK shall be maintained so that it is accessible at all times for EMPLOYEE use and used for no other purpose. (Pf)
(B)  An automatic handwashing facility shall be used in accordance with manufacturer's instructions. (Pf)
violationsByInspectionidList.correctionDescription: Handwashing sinks are to be accessible for use at all times

violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: If necessary to keep rooms free of excessive heat, steam, condensation, vapors, obnoxious odors, smoke, and fumes, mechanical ventilation of sufficient capacity shall be provided.
Outer openings of a FOOD ESTABLISHMENT shall be protected against the entry of insects and rodents. Unless otherwise allowed by law.

(A) PHYSICAL FACILITIES shall be cleaned as often as necessary to keep them clean.
(B) Except spill cleanup, cleaning shall be done during periods when the least amount of FOOD is exposed such as after closing.
EQUIPMENT shall be maintained in a state of repair and condition that meets the requirements of the code.
Except as otherwise allowed, a toilet room located on the PREMISES shall be completely enclosed and provided with a tight-fitting and self-closing door.

(A) Wall and ceiling covering materials shall be attached so that they are EASILY CLEANABLE.
(B) Except in areas used only for dry storage, concrete, porous blocks, or bricks used for indoor wall construction shall be finished and SEALED to provide a SMOOTH, nonabsorbent, EASILY CLEANABLE surface.
PHYSICAL FACILITIES shall be maintained in good repair.
EQUIPMENT shall be maintained in a state of repair and condition that meets the requirements of the code.
Outer openings of a FOOD ESTABLISHMENT shall be protected against the entry of insects and rodents. Unless otherwise allowed by law.
EQUIPMENT shall be maintained in a state of repair and condition that meets the requirements of the code.
